channel.title: Jamie Taylor: The Underground House Sessions
channel.description: A weekly two hour radio show presented by Jamie Taylor. Expect to hear the finest deep and soulful house along with a touch a of jazz and contemporary modern soul. For more info go to... www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep & Soulful House
channel.itunes:author: Jamie Taylor
channel.itunes:summary: A weekly two hour radio show presented by Jamie Taylor. Expect to hear the finest deep and soulful house along with a touch a of jazz and contemporary modern soul. For more info go to... www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor

item.title: Flori's Secret Agency Shuffle
item.description: Hello guys, hope you're all well. Apologies for the lack of pods recently! This a mix I recorded the other day for my new agency: www.thesecretagency.net It's a collection of vinyl I've enjoyed playing recently. In other news, Ethyl and I have another EP out. It's called Paisley Riffs and it's out now on one of our favourite labels, Quintessentials. You can get it at all your favourite record shops. Here are some clips: http://www.juno.co.uk/products/Paisley-Riffs/393833-01/ The digital release will be available over the next couple of weeks on all the usuals, Beatport, Traxsource, What People Play etc. Mix Playlist: Pitch Black City - Runaway [Mahogani] Ryo Murakami - Depths [Quintessentials] Kinoeye - Mean Old World [WT] Anton Zap - Can't Tell You [Ethereal] Norma Jean Bell - Dreams [Peacefrog] Hunee - Took My Love [Drumpoet Community] Steinhoff & Hammouda with Dionne - Touch [Smallville] Vincent Halliburton - Something I Feel (Rick Wilhite pres: Vibes, New & Rare Music) [Rush Hour] Jon Cutler feat. Vanessa Freeman pres. Focus (Lifted Up) (Main Mix) [Distant Music] John Roberts - Relate [Laid] STL - Wasabi Flavoured (Things From The Basement) [Something] Lerosa - Fags (Night Radio EP) [Uzuri Recordings] John Roberts - Lines (2010 III/III) [Dial] Moody - It's 2 Late 4 U And Me (Ol' Dirty Vinyl) [KDJ] Kyle Hall - Ghosten (Must See EP) [Third Ear] Hope you like it, Cheers J www.myspace.com/floriprod www.soundcloud.com/flori jamietaylormusic@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Jamie Taylor
item.itunes:summary:
Hello guys, hope you're all well. Apologies for the lack of pods recently!
This a mix I recorded the other day for my new agency: www.thesecretagency.net
It's a collection of vinyl I've enjoyed playing recently.
In other news, Ethyl and I have another EP out. It's called Paisley Riffs and it's out now on one of our favourite labels, Quintessentials.
You can get it at all your favourite record shops. Here are some clips: http://www.juno.co.uk/products/Paisley-Riffs/393833-01/
The digital release will be available over the next couple of weeks on all the usuals, Beatport, Traxsource, What People Play etc.
Mix Playlist:
Pitch Black City - Runaway [Mahogani] Ryo Murakami - Depths [Quintessentials] Kinoeye - Mean Old World [WT] Anton Zap - Can't Tell You [Ethereal] Norma Jean Bell - Dreams [Peacefrog] Hunee - Took My Love [Drumpoet Community] Steinhoff & Hammouda with Dionne - Touch [Smallville] Vincent Halliburton - Something I Feel (Rick Wilhite pres: Vibes, New & Rare Music) [Rush Hour] Jon Cutler feat. Vanessa Freeman pres. Focus (Lifted Up) (Main Mix) [Distant Music] John Roberts - Relate [Laid] STL - Wasabi Flavoured (Things From The Basement) [Something] Lerosa - Fags (Night Radio EP) [Uzuri Recordings] John Roberts - Lines (2010 III/III) [Dial] Moody - It's 2 Late 4 U And Me (Ol' Dirty Vinyl) [KDJ] Kyle Hall - Ghosten (Must See EP) [Third Ear]
Hope you like it,
Cheers
J
www.myspace.com/floriprod www.soundcloud.com/flori
jamietaylormusic@gmail.com

item.title: Guest Mix for the Freerange Records Radio Show December 2009
item.description: Happy New Year! Hope you all had a lovely festive period. Here's a little mix I did for Freerange Records. Some of you will have heard it on the Freerange podcast but the sound quality was a little ropey for some unknown reason. This one's much better. Also, if you haven't heard it already, have a listen to an EP I made with Ethyl which came out a few weeks ago. A deep house 3 tracker: Ethyl & Flori - The Trimley EP [Freerange Records] Beatport: https://www.beatport.com/en-US/html/content/release/detail/209336/The%20Trimley%20EP Traxsource: http://www.traxsource.com/index.php?act=show&fc=tpage&cr=titles&cv=42474 Juno: http://www.juno.co.uk/ppps/products/1504167-02.htm Mix Playlist: Kreem feat. Jennifer Kendall - Now Is The Time (Chez 'N' Trent Club Mix) [Unknown Label] Peven Everett - Special (Timmy Regisford Remix) [Trippin] Derrick May - ATL MI (Music Institute 20th Anniversary Part 2 of 3) [NDATL Muzik] Rick Wade - Feel It (Original Mix) [Funky Chocolate Records] DJ Fudge - Tafina (Haim Cheli Project) [KIF] Alex Agore - That Would Be Alright (I Remember House EP) [4 Lux] Rondenion - The Beautiful Memory (Tokyo Deep!) [Aesthetic Audio] Cheers J www.myspace.com/floriprod www.soundcloud.com/flori jamietaylormusic@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Jamie Taylor
item.itunes:summary:
Happy New Year! Hope you all had a lovely festive period. Here's a little mix I did for Freerange Records. Some of you will have heard it on the Freerange podcast but the sound quality was a little ropey for some unknown reason. This one's much better.

item.title: Jamie & Ethyl live from Circuit @ Sosho, 09.05.09 Part Three
item.description: Part Three: Cavalier – Deep Ride (Ride ‘Em EP) [Drumpoet Community] Vincenzo vs. Duffer Swift – Got To Be (Herbert Remix) [Raw Elements] Jesper Dahlbäck – Untitled (The Persuader) [Svek] Knarf Skipson – Jusome (The Flatwik EP) [Quintessentials] Kez YM – Washing My Heart (City Soul EP) [Yore] DPlay – Tschaka (Huub Sand) [Running Back] Ethyl & Flori – Coney Island Boppers [Unsigned] Langenberg - Alternate Rhythm [Dessous Recordings] Azuni – I Feel For You (City Look) [STHLM Audio] Motor City Drum Ensemble – Keep Up (Lonely One) [20:20 Vision] Martinez - Day By Day [Moon Harbour Recordings] Kenny Dixon Jr. – Midnights (Soul Sounds) [Soul City] The Mountain People – 000.1 [Mountain People] Hope you enjoyed the music. jamietaylormusic@gmail.com www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor www.myspace.com/ethylmusic

item.title: Jamie & Ethyl live from Circuit @ Sosho, 09.05.09 Part Two
item.description: Part Two: Ethyl (Continued): James Duncan – You and Me [Real Soon] Wbeeza – Heavy Stuff [Third Ear] Scott Ferguson – I Cried For You (Walk In The Park Remix) [Deep Vibes] Makam – Dreaming Away [Sushitech Purple] L&N – Walking [Bretzel] Dop – I’m Just a Man (Agnes Mix) [Eklo] Ethyl & Flori – Hing [Unsigned] Alton Miller - Inner8 (Literon Remix) [Rize Radical] The Asphalt – 8 Mile Road (Sascha Dive Mix) [Deep Explorer] Jamie: MCDE - ? Slowhouse Three – Track 2 [Slowhouse Recordings] Knarf Skipson – Sweep (Vocals by Anita Ladel Barrio) (The Flatwik EP) [Quintessentials] Christian Burkhardt – Suit (The Yard EP) [Raum Musik] Thanks for listening guys, if you’d like to get in touch don’t hesitate to drop me a line: jamietaylormusic@gmail.com www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor www.mysapce.com/ethylmusic

item.title: Jamie & Ethyl live from Circuit @ Sosho, 09.05.09 Part One
item.description: Hi everyone, hope you’re all well. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the lack of uploads since January. Let’s hope we can get back on track with this three part live set courtesy of myself and Tring’s finest Ethyl. The music you’re hopefully head nodding to was recorded at one of London’s loveliest parties Circuit. If you like what you hear then drop by our myspace pages to say hello: www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor email: jamietaylormusic@gmail.com www.myspace.com/ethylmusic email: ethylmusic@gmail.com Enjoy x Part One: Ethyl & Jamie: Theo Parrish – Chemistry [Sound Signature] Henry L – Wake Up [Farside] ? – Track One (Subway To Cologne) [Story] Anton Zap – Alice Miracle [Uzuri (forthcoming)] Motor City Drum Ensemble – Raw Cuts 3 [MCDE] SoulPhiction – Regrets [Philpot Records] Moodymann – People [Peacefrog] Benny Blanko - Put Your Hands feat. Pedro Polanski [Playhouse] Charles Webster - I'm Falling (Pepe Braddock Mix) [Defected] Lerosa – Pussy [Enclave Recordings] SoulPhiction – Reclap [Sonar Kollektiv] Ray Valioso – You’ll Never Be Mine [Deep Vibes] Slowhouse – EP – B2 [Slowhouse] Ethyl: Norm Talley - Change (Mike Huckaby Remix) [Third Ear] Harrison Crump – Ride (Club Mix) [Electric Chair] John Roberts – Hesitate [Dial] Rick Wade – Prime Expansion [Yore] Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Jamie Taylor
item.itunes:summary:
Hi everyone, hope you’re all well. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the lack of uploads since January. Let’s hope we can get back on track with this three part live set courtesy of myself and Tring’s finest Ethyl. The music you’re hopefully head nodding to was recorded at one of London’s loveliest parties Circuit. If you like what you hear then drop by our myspace pages to say hello:
www.myspace.com/djjamietaylor email: jamietaylormusic@gmail.com
www.myspace.com/ethylmusic email: ethylmusic@gmail.com
Enjoy x

Theo Parrish – Chemistry [Sound Signature] Henry L – Wake Up [Farside] ? – Track One (Subway To Cologne) [Story] Anton Zap – Alice Miracle [Uzuri (forthcoming)] Motor City Drum Ensemble – Raw Cuts 3 [MCDE] SoulPhiction – Regrets [Philpot Records] Moodymann – People [Peacefrog] Benny Blanko - Put Your Hands feat. Thanks for listening!

item.title: UHS: 12th January 2009 Part One
item.description: Jamie Taylor UHS: "The Final Show on Ramjam" | 12th January 2009 | 10 PM - Midnight (GMT) www.ramjamradio.com NEW E-MAIL: jamietaylormusic@gmail.com Here's my final broadcast for Ramjam Radio. Fear not though, I'll be continuing the Podcast. Thank you for the support, enjoy. Part One: The Rebirth - The Journey In (Album - Galactic Soul) [BBE] 2000 Black - Simple Sacrifice (Album - A Next Set A Rockers) [Third Ear] Jukka Eskola - 1974 [Compilation - Inside Scandinavia Volume 2) [Raw Fusion Recordings] Yasuko Agawa - New York Afternoon (Quasimode Remix) (Re-Mode (Jazz Club Digs)) [Victor Entertainment, Japan] The Beaujolais Band - Milestones (Album - Talk, Talk & More Talk) [Acid Jazz] Marvin Gaye - Funky Space Reincarnation (Album - Here, My Dear) [UMG Recordings] John Klemmer - Free Soul (Live Version) [Touch Records] Blaze - I Wonder (Album - 25 Years Later) [Motown] DJ Day - A Place To Go (Album - The Day Before) [Melting Pot Music] Metropolitan Jazz Affair - Corovon - (Album - MJA) [Patchwork Productions] Stevie Wonder - My Cherie Amour (Album - My Cherie Amour) [Tamla] 4Hero - Our Own Place (Album - Play With Changes) [Milan Records]
item.dc:creator: Jamie Taylor

www.ramjamradio.com

Here's my final broadcast for Ramjam Radio. Fear not though, I'll be continuing the Podcast. Thank you for the support, enjoy.
